Tesla Announces Release Date for First Quarter 2016 Financial Results | Tesla Investor Relations Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Logo Skip to main content Tesla homepage Investor Relations Skip to main content Dashboard Impact SEC Filings Corporate Governance Press Releases Account Press Releases Press Releases Back Tesla Announces Release Date for First Quarter 2016 Financial Results Globe Newswire Apr 20, 2016 &nbsp; PALO ALTO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 04/20/16 -- Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) will post its financial results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2016, after market close on Wednesday, May 4, 2016. At that time, Tesla will issue a brief advisory release containing a link to the Q1 2016 Shareholder Letter, available on the Tesla IR website. Tesla management will hold a live question &amp; answer webcast that day at 2:30pm Pacific Time (5:30pm Eastern Time) to discuss the Company's financial and business results and outlook. What: Date of Tesla Q1 2016 Financial Results and Q&amp;A Webcast When: Wednesday, May 4, 2016 Time: 2:30pm Pacific Time / 5:30pm Eastern Time Shareholder Letter: http://ir.tesla.com Webcast: http://ir.tesla.com (live and replay) Approximately two hours after the Q&amp;A session, an archived version of the webcast will be available on the Company's website. For additional information, please visit ir.tesla.com .
